version_name: 1.0.3Plan ahead when it comes to shipping costs. Get rate and transit time estimates in the app with the new Rates feature.

version_description:
Bug Fixes
-Fixed an issue that prevented some users from logging in with certain passwords

What's New in Version 1.0.3

Plan ahead when it comes to shipping costs. Get rate and transit time estimates in the app with the new Rates feature.
Support for Canada and Mexico
Bug Fix -  Fixed an issue that caused users to receive "Your country is not supported" error message
Support for Canada and Mexico
Support for all Countries
Bug Fixes

•Added Push Notifications to enable you to keep up with your important shipments
•General bug fixes

•Take advantage of 3D Touch to access quick actions
•Share package tracking details with family and friends or within other apps
•Conveniently select a recently used address for rating
•General bug fixes

We appreciate your feedback and yes, we are listening. Enjoy our latest release where we have implemented the following improvements and enhancements:
•Improved the application launch speed
•Enhanced the navigation experience
•Opt
Enjoy our latest update where we have resolved some general bug fixes and made more improvements to enhance our  app to deliver a faster, easier and more reliable experience.

Enjoy our latest update of the FedEx Mobile app.
- Access My FedEx Rewards like never before, right from the FedEx Mobile app, allowing you to check and activate offers, view status and more on the go.
- Enhanced visibility and tracking not

Here it is!  Announcing Shipping on the FedEx Mobile app for FedEx account holders.  Need a shipping label while on the go?  You can now create a shipping label on the app and drop off your package at a convenient FedEx Location.   Simple, Easy, Convenien
Bug Fixes
This release has performance enhancements, translation revisions and minor bug fixes.

Access your FedEx.com Address Book for easy input of shipping addresses.
General Bug fixes

With this release, you now can “request a pickup” while creating a label in the shipping flow.  To reduce your manual input, auto address completion has also been added.  Logging in has never been easier with Touch ID and facial recognition ID (iPhone X o
